data.name: Matchpoint - Tennis Championships | Legends DLC
data.detailed_description:
Play two of the biggest Tennis legends in history!


The Legends DLC includes two additional players, the retired Tennis legends Tommy Haas and Tim Henman.
Both become available as playable characters in both single and multiplayer modes.
data.about_the_game:
Play two of the biggest Tennis legends in history!


The Legends DLC includes two additional players, the retired Tennis legends Tommy Haas and Tim Henman.
Both become available as playable characters in both single and multiplayer modes.
data.short_description: Play two of the biggest Tennis legends in history!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German*, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Japanese*, Arabic, Czech, Dutch, Korean, Norwegian, Portuguese, Swedish, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD or Intel, 3.5 GHz or higher (AMD FX-8300 / Intel i3-6100)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD / Nvidia dedicated GPU, 2 GB dedicated VRAM (Nvidia 780 3GB / AMD R9 285 2GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated or dedicated DirectX 11 soundcard
  • Additional Notes: Integrated or dedicated DirectX 11 soundcard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: AMD or Intel, 3,0 GHz or higher (AMD Ryzen 5 1600 / Intel i5-7400)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD / Nvidia dedicated GPU, 6 GB dedicated VRAM (AMD RX 590 8GB / Nvidia GTX 1060 6GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated or dedicated DirectX 11 soundcard
  • Additional Notes: Integrated or dedicated DirectX 11 soundcard

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
